review: Not much more functionality than my smart TV already had and doesn't work at all with ipad applications.
author: Richard M Hendrix

review: What a useful item! Chromecast is an affordable alternative that rivals much more expensive devices. You can stream from your mobile devices (both Android and iOS), or directly from a computer.  Some of the apps are exclusively Android (which makes sense, since it's a Google product), but there are plenty of apps for iOS, as well. If you review the apps available on the Google Website, I think you'll agree that Chromecast is a no-brainer addition to any household's media center.
author: Moombamimi

review: I like it. Just wish that i could use Amazon Prime with it
